Posts.Content: Can't believe your post. I only got told I needed a mastectomy last week, I'm going to theatre on Friday 24th of this month. I would love them. I got one bra from my nurse. Been to 3 shops today but no where has front fastening bras. Would be appreciated if you still have them x
Posts.Title: Mastectomy Bras size 40D available

Posts.Content: Thanks, I'll try to get in touch with you asap, as I'm going out for a family meal later x
